story

" GROOMING IS THE SECRET OF REAL ELEGANCE. THE BEST CLOTHES, THE MOST WONDERFUL JEWELS, THE MOST GLAMOROUS BEAUTY DON'T COUNT WITHOUT GOOD GROOMING "

- CHRISTIAN DIOR

ABOUT D-SHAVE

D’Shave encapsulates the art and passion of modern age techniques of Barbering, creating a combination of old school hair styling and modern age grooming techniques with an Indian twist. With D shave we want to inspire all the barbers in India and be a bench mark for the work we do and be the leading force of Indian Barbering. We want to educate every barber in coming years and define barbering in professional way.

ABOUT D-MAN

Darshan, embarked upon his journey with a modest beginning, interning at a Salon. His immense talent propelled him further into the mercurial world of Indian Cinema. Darshan has contributed in creating iconic styles for A-List celebrities like Salman Khan, Sanjay Dutt, Ranbir Kapoor, Ranveer Singh, Saif Ali Khan and many more. Darshan’s passion, perseverance & dedication are directed towards adding value to the Indian styling industry.
